interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz Review Date: 2020/01/27 Store: Tame the Beast Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 FL OZ', 'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 3.54 x 1.54 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018546'} Review Text: I ordered the 'Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz' for review.
I love to try different beard oils. This one is a medium weight oil that initially smells very lightly scented. It's a very "cologne" type scent which I really don't care for. I am more into the woodsy, tea tree, sandalwood type scents. At first smell, this beard oil had a very light scent however once applied, this scent lasts a very long time. This is where I had a hard time with it. I like to put my beard oil on in the morning and night after brushing my teeth and I was still able to smell this beard oil into the next morning, which might have been a good thing had I enjoyed the scent. The beard oil itself as I said earlier, is a medium weight, and has a decent hold and is actually a nice overall beard oil but I ended up giving it to my son, as I personally didn't like the scent at all. Review Title: Nice quality but the cologne scent is not my favorite. Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Portable Travel Bottles Set, 3oz Silicone Travel Size Toiletries Containers, Leakproof, Foldable, Squeezable, Refillable, TSA Carry On for Shampoo Lotion Soap cosmetic (Pack of 2) INNERNEED {'Brand': 'INNERNEED', 'Capacity': '3 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Travel', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.7 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} I ordered the 'Portable Travel Bottles Set, 3oz Leakproof Foldable Squeezable Silicone Travel Size Toiletries Containers, TSA Carry On for Shampoo Lotion Soap (Pack of 2)' for review. My daughter has her favorite hair products that she has to pack when we travel and it's never fun packing those large bottles and other travel containers are just to small and or hard to fill. This set is so nice with the wide mouth openings which make them easy to fill and as you use the product, up they collapse to take up less space plus make it much easier to get every last drop of that precious product out haha. We have tried other compact TSA approved toiletry containers and I will say that these are so much more functional than the others, and most definitely of greater value. Great for traveling with your favorite product. Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen – Produces Longer, Healthier, Denser Lashes and Thicker Brows – Eyelash Serum – Boosts Skin Collagen – Drug-Free Formula - 1 fl oz. Veta {'Color': 'Silver, Black', 'Brand': 'Veta', 'Item Form': 'lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.61 x 1.57 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '861121002645'} I ordered this Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen for review. My teenage daughter was willing to try it out for me and these are her thoughts. "The pen application is not difficult. However, if you accidentally get it in your eyes it stings really badly. I had used it a couple of times before that happened. But, now I don't want to use it again."
Unfortunately she did not use it long enough to see if there was any lash growth. If my wife is brave enough to try it I will update my review. I love to try different beard oils. This one is a medium weight oil that initially smells very lightly scented. It's a very "cologne" type scent which I really don't care for. I am more into the woodsy, tea tree, sandalwood type scents. At first smell, this beard oil had a very light scent however once applied, this scent lasts a very long time. This is where I had a hard time with it. I like to put my beard oil on in the morning and night after brushing my teeth and I was still able to smell this beard oil into the next morning, which might have been a good thing had I enjoyed the scent. The beard oil itself as I said earlier, is a medium weight, and has a decent hold and is actually a nice overall beard oil but I ended up giving it to my son, as I personally didn't like the scent at all. Nice quality but the cologne scent is not my favorite.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Travel Convenience:** The user prioritizes practicality and functionality in travel products, focusing on efficient space management.
- **Ease of Use:** They favor user-friendly items that enhance daily routines, reflecting a strong preference for ease in everyday applications.
- **Compactness:** A continual focus on lightweight and collapsible solutions signals a desire for minimal packing to ease travel.
- **Value for Money:** The user seeks cost-effective products that provide superior value, while also considering family-oriented needs in their purchases.
- **Quality Products:** Positive past experiences shape future buying decisions, but they remain cautious about new items, particularly regarding safety and usability.
- **Family Considerations:** Recent interactions emphasize a family-oriented mindset, reflected in gift-giving practices that consider their family members’ preferences, especially for beauty and grooming products.
- **Scent Preferences:** A recent review of grooming products reveals a specific preference for natural, earthy scents over cologne-type fragrances, indicating a nuanced approach to personal care items.

Overall, this user's preferences highlight a commitment to functional, safe, and high-quality products that cater to both personal and family needs. Their cautious evaluation of new offerings, along with specific scent preferences, illustrates their thoughtful approach to product selection, prioritizing overall satisfaction and usability.
